web-app.display-name: Shepherd Project Framework for Mark-Recapture Studies

init-param.param-value:
#See Shiro API http://shiro.apache.org/static/current/apidocs/org/apache/shiro/web/servlet/IniShiroFilter.html
#create an object of the RoleSecurityJdbcRealm #IniShiroFilter will inject that object into the SecurityManager [main] realmA = org.ecocean.security.ShepherdRealm roles.unauthorizedUrl = /accessDenied.jsp authcBasicWildbook = org.ecocean.security.WildbookBasicHttpAuthenticationFilter
authc.loginUrl = /login.jsp
#this application will use all the default #filters (see link above) #for example the default login page is /login.jsp #users who try to access a page protected by Shiro #will be sent to /login.jsp [filters]
#only let authenticated users #with the appropriate role #view the web pages in the secure #and admin areas [urls]
/rest/** = authcBasicWildbook,roles[rest] #/api/** = authcBasicWildbook,roles[rest-readonly]
/appadmin/scanTaskAdmin.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /appadmin/listImages.jsp = authcBasicWildbook
/appadmin/** = authc, roles[admin] /MassSetInformOthers = authc, roles[admin] /MassExposeGBIF = authc, roles[admin] /MassSetLocationCodeFromLocationString = authc, roles[admin] /MassSwapLocationCode = authc, roles[admin] /logs/** = authc, roles[admin] /xcalendar/** = authc, roles[researcher] /SubmitSpots = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /InterconnectSubmitSpots = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /interconnectSubmitSpots = authc, roles[imageProcessor]
/encounters/encounterSpotTool.jsp = authc, roles[imageProcessor] /SubmitSpotsAndImage = authc, roles[imageProcessor]
/GenePopExport = authc, roles[researcher]
/IndividualSetNickname = authc, roles[researcher]
/individualSearch.jsp = roles[researcher] /GenePopExport = authc, roles[researcher] /individualSearch.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualSearchResults.jsp = authc /individualSearchResultsExport.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualSearchResultsAnalysis.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /individualMappedSearchResults.jsp = authc /individualThumbnailSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher]
/encounters/thumbnailSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/encounterSearch.jsp = roles[researcher] /encounters/searchResults.jsp = authc /encounters/searchResultsAnalysis.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/mappedSearchResults.jsp = authc /encounters/mappedSearchResultsSex.jsp = authc /encounters/mappedSearchResultsHaplotype.jsp = authc /encounters/exportSearchResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/imageViewer.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/searchComparison.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/searchComparisonResults.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /encounters/encounterSpotVisualizer.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetAlternateID = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetAlternateID = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetState = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetScarring = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetGPS = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetVerbatimEventDate = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetLifeStage = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetCountry = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetTissueSample = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetHaplotype = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetMeasurement = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveHaplotype = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveBiologicalMeasurement = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetMicrosatelliteMarkers = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveMicrosatelliteMarkers = authc, roles[researcher]
/RelationshipCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /RelationshipDelete = authc, roles[researcher]
/ImportSRGD = authc, roles[admin] /IndividualCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceCreate = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceRemoveEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualRemoveEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceAddEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualAddEncounter = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleSetSexAnalysis = authc, roles[researcher] /TissueSampleRemoveSexAnalysis = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterRemoveTissueSample = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterRemoveImage = authc, roles[researcher] /SinglePhotoVideoRemoveKeyword = authc, roles[researcher] /SinglePhotoVideoAddKeyword = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportGeneGISFormat = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportKML = authc, roles[researcher] /UserCreate = authc, roles[admin] /UserDelete = authc, roles[admin] /UserAddProfileImage = authc, roles[researcher] /UserRemoveProfileImage = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportExcelFile = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportShapefile = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSearchExportEmailAddresses = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterAddComment = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceAddComment = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetIndividualCount = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualAddComment = authc, roles[researcher] /SimpleCMROutput = authc, roles[researcher] /GenalexExportCodominantMSDataBySize = authc, roles[researcher] /SOCPROGExport = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSetGroupBehavior = authc, roles[researcher] /EncounterSetBehavior = authc, roles[researcher] /CJS = authc, roles[researcher] /software.jsp = authc, roles[researcher] /DeleteAllDataPermanently = authc, roles[destroyer] /encounters/searchExport = authc, roles[researcher] /welcome.jsp = authc /EncounterSetSubmitterID = authc, roles[researcher] /UserResetAcceptedUserAgreement = authc, roles[admin] /IndividualSetYearOfBirth = authc, roles[researcher] /IndividualSetYearOfDeath = authc, roles[researcher] /KinalyzerExport = authc, roles[researcher]
/myAccount.jsp = authc /UserSelfUpdate = authc
/MyAccountAddProfileImage = authc /MyAccountRemoveProfileImage = authc
/IndividualSetNickname = authc, roles[researcher]
/SubmitSpotsAndTransformImage = authc,roles[researcher]
/ResurrectDeletedEncounter = authc,roles[admin]
/OccurrenceSearchExportMetadataExcel = authc, roles[researcher] /OccurrenceSearchExportGtm = authc, roles[researcher]

servlet.description: Log in user using username and password provided
